title: Champagne cake with coconut filling
ingredients: ['Filling', '50g butter', '1 tablespoon white wine', '16 large plain marshmallows', '75g desiccated coconut', 'Fondant icing', '500g icing sugar', '4 tablespoons golden syrup', '4 tablespoons water', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '2 drops red food colouring (optional)', '6 large plain marshmallows']
